channel.title: Image Upscaling on The Journeyman Modeler
channel.description: Recent content in Image Upscaling on The Journeyman Modeler

item.title: Upscaling a Movie Poster
item.description: TL;DR: I attempt to upscale a low resolution movie poster using the super_image python package. Though overall the image looks sharper, the text in the upscaled poster is not too clear. I have a poster of a movie released in 1962, it is not super high resolution: I wanted to see if I could upscale this poster using super_image, a freely available python package that contains various image upscaling models.
